events.name: 【193】吊るされた魔術士 自動実行

parameters: Researcher Caros: I apologize for the mess.

Mage Relm: It's like Caros-san's image has changed to that
of a weapon arsenal.

Researcher Caros: Since ancient times, crystal research and
weapon development have been inseparable, for better or for
worse.

Researcher Caros: In truth, I want to pursue a dream where
no one gets hurt, like a flying ship...

Researcher Caros: Alright, let's stop with the gloomy talk!
I have prepared some crystals infused with magical power.

Mage Relm: It feels strange... I have a sensation as if this
clothing is resonating with me.
後ACT：リルムをオーラが包み込む

Researcher Caros: Amazing...! The magical power is
converging... but at this rate...!

Mage Relm: Don't worry, I will slowly restore the magical
power to the crystals.

Mage Relm: I've seen her go out of control once, so dealing
with this genius will be a piece of cake!
Mage Relm: But please, absolutely do not interfere, okay?

Mage Relm: I wasn't joking! It's really dangerous, so please
stay away, do you hear me!?

Researcher Caros: If the number of crystals increases, we
should be able to see even more brilliance!
後ACT：カロースが部屋中にクリスタルをばらまく

Mage Relm (This is clearly strange... The ceremonial attire
and the crystals are resonating, something is happening!?)

Mage Relm: I-I can't control this overwhelming magical
power...! If it continues like this, the magic will go out
of control... Ugh, this is bad...!

Mage Relm: There's no other choice...! I have to forcefully
reverse the flow of magic into the crystals!
後order：アダルトシーン「843」再生
Would you like to skip the adult scene?
後order：アダルトシーン「843」再生
Mage Relm: I really went through a terrible experience...

Researcher Caros: It's not something that can be forgiven
with an apology, but I truly feel sorry for what I've
done...

Mage Relm: This ceremonial attire has a connection to the
demon of chaos, Dowa.

Mage Relm: I think that power has kept us away from our
normal state.

Mage Relm: So let's just accept it as a mutual [experiment
failure].
Researcher Caros: If you say so...

Researcher Caros: This is the promised reward and a small
apology.

Researcher Caros: I promise that I won't conduct any more
reckless experiments. I'm truly sorry.
3.イベント後のプレイヤーの位置
